MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in St Peters Square, Mwrog Street, and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:09 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate an unconfirmed report of third party damage to our network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by  2:15 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:54 pm on 19th April, 2021.
